DOC.brief_summary: Women with pelvic organ prolapse often accompany with urinary symptoms or sexual dysfunction, and analyzing the association will be helpful to identify the indication of proper management. Therefore, the aim of this study is to identify the above associations by perineal sonography.
DOC.brief_title: The Association of Pelvic Organ Prolapse Severity and Urinary Symptoms and Sexual Function
DOC.detailed_description: Women with pelvic organ prolapse often accompany with urinary symptoms or sexual dysfunction, and analyzing the association will be helpful to identify the indication of proper management. Therefore, the aim of this study is to identify the above associations by perineal sonography.
DOC.criteria: all patients with lower urinary tract symptoms and will undergo urodynamic studies
